title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository for running large language models locally with a lightweight, extensible framework.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published to npm as 'ollama'.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, published to PyPI as 'ollama'.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (langchain-ollama on PyPI) for using Ollama models in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama with multi-model chat, code highlighting, and RAG.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama published to Maven Central; supports chat, generate, pull, and embeddings.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based CLI for Ollama with REPL, conversation history, and shell completions.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama to use local models for retrieval-augmented generation pipelines.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama with chat, generate, pull, and embeddings APIs.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama on NuGet; supports chat, generate, and embeddings.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and persistent model storage.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) and docker-compose examples for running Ollama containerized.

title: ollama-litellm
summary: LiteLLM proxy support for Ollama, allowing OpenAI-compatible endpoints over 100+ local models.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings and LlamaIndex to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI wrapper that exposes Ollama endpoints with OpenAI-style chat completions and SSE streaming.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension to run, chat, and manage Ollama models inside the editor sidebar.

title: ollama-kotlin-sdk
summary: Multiplatform Kotlin SDK for Ollama supporting JVM, Android, and iOS via Ktor client.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing TypeScript/JavaScript bindings for the Ollama API.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for Python integration with Ollama, supporting sync and async workflows.
